name: The Summoned Hero
description: You are called to another universe to fulfill a desperate prophecy. A world not your own needs salvation, and fate has chosen you as its champion.

lesson.insight: True heroism means answering the call, even when the world calling isn't your own.

stages.name: The Call from Beyond
stages.description: A voice from another universe reaches across the void. It speaks of prophecy, of desperate need, of you being chosen. The summons is both invitation and plea.

stage_attractors.description: Pressure to understand the cross-universe summons

on_enter_effects.content_hint: You see another world: unfamiliar stars, strange faces, desperate hope in their eyes

stages.name: At the Dimensional Rift
stages.description: The portal opens. Reality tears. You stand at the threshold between universes. Behind you: everything you know. Ahead: a world that needs you. The choice is yours.

stage_attractors.description: Intense pressure to decide whether to cross

stages.name: The Crossing
stages.description: You step through. Reality dissolves. You exist in the space between universes - a moment of infinite possibility and infinite terror. Then: arrival.

stages.name: New World, New Rules
stages.description: You emerge in an alien universe. Different laws of physics, different cultures, different magic. You are the outsider, the stranger, the prophesied hero. Learning begins.

stage_attractors.description: Pressure to adapt to foreign universe

stages.name: The Prophecy's Trial
stages.description: The universe that summoned you now tests you. Are you truly the one foretold? Can you wield powers unknown in your home universe? Will you break, or become what they need?

stages.name: Salvation Delivered
stages.description: You have done what was asked. The prophecy is fulfilled. This universe is saved. You are celebrated as a hero... but you are still a stranger. Do you stay or return home?

on_enter_effects.content_hint: Two homes, two lives. Which world truly needs you now?

stages.name: Home, But Transformed
stages.description: You return to your original universe, but you are no longer the person who left. You have seen other realities, saved another world. How small your old life seems now.

stages.name: The Call Unanswered
stages.description: You refuse. The portal closes. That other universe will find another hero... or fall into darkness. You will never know. But the weight of the unanswered call remains.

stages.name: Stranded in the Void
stages.description: Something went wrong during the crossing. You are trapped in the space between universes - neither here nor there. A fate worse than death: eternal displacement.

name: Refugee from a Dying Universe
description: Your home universe is collapsing. To survive, you must flee to another reality - but refugees are rarely welcome, and the trauma of losing your world will never fully heal.

lesson.insight: Home is not a place but the memories you carry. Loss shapes you, but need not define you.

stages.name: The End of All Things
stages.description: Your universe is dying. Reality itself is unraveling. The laws of physics fail. Stars go dark. Time becomes unstable. Everyone you know faces annihilation. There is only one hope: flee to another universe.

stage_attractors.description: Overwhelming pressure to escape dying universe

stages.name: Flight into the Unknown
stages.description: You abandon your dying universe. No prophecy guides you, no destination is certain. This is raw survival: leap blindly into another reality and pray it can sustain you.

on_enter_effects.content_hint: Your last glimpse of home: collapsing, dying, gone forever

stages.name: The Refugee's Burden
stages.description: You arrive in a stable universe, but you are not wanted. You are the outsider, the strange one, the refugee. They fear you might bring your universe's corruption. Proving your worth begins.

stage_attractors.description: Pressure to build trust in foreign universe

stages.name: Between Two Worlds
stages.description: You try to adapt. Learn their customs. Hide your grief. Pretend you belong. But the nightmares persist: your dying universe, the faces of those who didn't escape. You are haunted.

stage_attractors.description: Pressure to integrate into new society

stages.name: Roots in Foreign Soil
stages.description: Time passes. Wounds heal, though scars remain. You have built a new life here. You are no longer just a refugee - you are a member of this universe. Home is where you make it.

on_enter_effects.content_hint: You plant a seed from your lost universe in new soil. It blooms.

stages.name: The Eternal Traveler
stages.description: You accept that you will never truly belong anywhere. Instead of seeking a new home, you become a wanderer between universes - carrying memories of the lost, witnessing countless realities.

stages.name: Gone with the Old World
stages.description: You refuse to abandon your universe. You choose to die with your world rather than live as a refugee. Whether this is noble or foolish, it is final.

stages.name: Nowhere to Call Home
stages.description: No universe accepts you. You are cast out again and again. You drift between realities, unwanted everywhere. The eternal exile.

name: Bridge Between Worlds
description: Two universes are on the brink of conflict. You are chosen as a mediator - the only soul trusted by both sides. Prevent war, or watch realities clash and burn.

lesson.insight: Understanding requires walking between worlds. Peace is built on bridges, not walls.

stages.name: Tensions Rise
stages.description: Two universes, once separate, have made contact. Cultural differences breed fear. Fear breeds hostility. Both sides prepare for war. You are selected as a neutral mediator.

stage_attractors.description: Pressure to understand both universes' perspectives

stages.name: Walking Between Realities
stages.description: You travel between the two universes, learning their cultures, hearing their grievances. You are neither fully trusted nor fully rejected - the eternal outsider mediating between worlds.

stage_attractors.description: Pressure to build trust with leaders from both universes

on_enter_effects.content_hint: You stand on a bridge between two worlds, holding hands on both sides

stages.name: The Breaking Point
stages.description: An incident occurs. A misunderstanding escalates. War seems inevitable. Both sides look to you for answers. This is the moment that decides everything.

stage_attractors.description: Critical pressure to find peaceful solution

stages.name: The Accord Signed
stages.description: Through patience, understanding, and tireless effort, you broker peace. The universes agree to coexist. War is averted. You are celebrated by both worlds as the one who prevented catastrophe.

on_enter_effects.content_hint: Two universes flourish side by side, connected by bridges of understanding

stages.name: Guardian of the Crossing
stages.description: You choose to remain as permanent liaison between the universes. Your life becomes an endless crossing between realities, ensuring the peace endures.

stages.name: Failure of Diplomacy
stages.description: Despite your efforts, war breaks out. The universes clash. Reality tears. You witness the horror of inter-universal conflict and carry the weight of failure.

stages.name: Trust Broken
stages.description: Both sides reject you as mediator. You are accused of bias, treachery, or incompetence. The diplomatic mission fails before it truly begins.

name: When Selves Collide
description: Across the multiverse, infinite versions of you exist. Now, dimensional barriers weaken and you meet your other selves. Unity or conflict? The choice defines all of you.

lesson.insight: You are not one self but infinite possibilities. Understanding who you could have been reveals who you are.

stages.name: The Mirror Cracks
stages.description: You catch a glimpse of yourself in another universe. But the reflection is wrong - it's you, but different. Different choices, different life, different person. Yet unmistakably you.

on_enter_effects.content_hint: You see yourself from outside: many yous, making different choices, living different lives

stages.name: The Meeting
stages.description: Dimensional barriers collapse. You meet your other selves face-to-face. The hero you could have been. The villain. The lover. The hermit. All you, all different. The confrontation begins.

stage_attractors.description: Pressure to understand how selves diverged

stages.name: Identity Crisis
stages.description: Your selves disagree. Some want to merge, become one unified being. Others demand independence. Some hate what they see in their alternates. The struggle intensifies.

stage_attractors.description: Critical pressure to resolve identity conflict

stages.name: The Synthesis
stages.description: Your alternate selves merge into one being. All experiences, all choices, all lives unite. You are no longer singular - you are the sum of all you could have been. Overwhelming power and terrible burden.

on_enter_effects.content_hint: Many rivers converge into one vast ocean

stages.name: Celebrating Difference
stages.description: Your selves choose to remain separate. You respect each other's divergence and return to your respective universes - connected by understanding but celebrating your differences.

stages.name: The Annihilation
stages.description: Conflict between selves escalates to violence. You fight your own alternate versions. Some selves are destroyed. You survive, but diminished - knowing you killed parts of yourself.

stages.name: Identity Dissolution
stages.description: You can no longer distinguish which version is the 'real' you. Identity fractures. You exist simultaneously as all your selves and none of them. Madness of infinite reflection.
